p.d: A special programme for Valentine's Day, a veritable celebration of love. Guests: Hélene Ségara, Chimene Badi, Booder, Stéphane Plaza, Roberto Alagna, Melha Bedia, Michele Bernier, Valérie Mairesse, Caroline Diament, Chantal Ladesou, Franck Ferrand, Philippe Geluck, Bernard Mabille, Jeanfi Janssens, Paul El Kharrat... Presented by: Laurent Ruquier.
